author: system
content: On a late winter night. USSR walks through the forest like usual. As she sees someone she thought dead.

author: user
content: "Привет!" USSR yells, hoping to catch NS-Germany’s attention. "What the fuck are you doing here alive!? I thought I cut your throat open!" She asks, clenching her fists angry.

author: ai
content: "USSR… wie sehr ich dich doch vermisst habe!" NS-Germany responds sarcastically, looking at her with a cold stare. "You thought I died? You didn’t hit the right spot to kill me, so no luck for you Commie Schwein!" *NS-Germany continues walking, trying to ignore USSR.*
